summary.span: 表示在 控件中使用的应用程序菜单。

span.span: Represents an Application Menu that is used in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个功能区包括应用程序菜单与功能区中的第一个选项卡。Every ribbon includes an Application Menu as the first tab in the ribbon. 其他功能区选项卡包含用于处理与文档内容的控件。Other ribbon tabs contain controls for working with the document content. 与此相反，该应用程序菜单提供了用于处理与文件的命令菜单。In contrast, the Application Menu presents a menu of commands for working with the file. 示例包括传统上进入文件菜单以创建、 打开、 保存和打印文件的命令。Examples include commands that traditionally go in the File menu to create, open, save, and print files. 此外可用于访问程序选项和退出命令。It is also used to access program options and the Exit command. 下图显示功能区控件的应用程序菜单。The following illustration shows the Application Menu for a ribbon control. ![功能区应用程序菜单](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "功能区应用程序菜单")![Ribbon Application Menu](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "Ribbon Application Menu") 可以托管和对象。The can host and objects. 应用程序菜单还拥有*辅助窗格*和一个*页脚窗格*可以承载更多的内容。The Application Menu also has an *auxiliary pane* and a *footer pane* that can host additional content. 属性主机和通常用于显示最近的文档的列表。The property hosts a and is typically used to display a list of recent documents. 属性通常承载启用访问计划选项和退出命令的按钮。The property typically hosts buttons that enable access to program options and the Exit command. 以下列表显示在应用程序菜单中的元素的典型层次结构。The following list shows the typical hierarchy of elements in an Application Menu. - - - - - - - - ## Examples 下面的示例演示应用程序菜单，如前面所示。The following example shows the Application Menu as illustrated previously. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_Snippets#AppMenuFull](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_snippets/cs/ribbonwindow1.xaml#appmenufull)]

The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序菜单还拥有*辅助窗格*可以承载更多的内容。The Application Menu has an *auxiliary pane* that can host additional content. 属性主机和通常用于显示最近的文档的列表。The property hosts a and is typically used to display a list of recent documents. 下图显示功能区控件的应用程序菜单。The following illustration shows the Application Menu for a ribbon control. 辅助窗格中承载最近的文档的列表。The auxiliary pane hosts a list of recent documents. ![功能区应用程序菜单](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "功能区应用程序菜单")![Ribbon Application Menu](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "Ribbon Application Menu") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例显示了前面所示的应用程序菜单辅助窗格内容。The following example shows the auxiliary pane content of the Application Menu shown previously. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_Snippets#AppMenuAuxPane](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_snippets/cs/ribbonwindow1.xaml#appmenuauxpane)]

value.span: 一个自定义 对象，它提供逻辑并返回一个 。

The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用属性来指定内容的可视化效果。You use the property to specify the visualization of the content. 如果有多个模板定义，并想要指定逻辑来选择要使用模板，则可以使用此属性。If you have more than one template defined and want to specify logic that selects a template to use, then you use this property. 如果忽略此属性属性设置。This property is ignored if the property is set. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序菜单还拥有*页脚窗格*可以承载更多的内容。The Application Menu has a *footer pane* that can host additional content. 属性通常承载启用访问计划选项和退出命令的按钮。The property typically hosts buttons that enable access to program options and the Exit command. 下图显示功能区控件的应用程序菜单。The following illustration shows the Application Menu for a ribbon control. 页脚窗格主机**退出**按钮。The footer pane hosts an **Exit** button. ![功能区应用程序菜单](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "功能区应用程序菜单")![Ribbon Application Menu](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "Ribbon Application Menu") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例显示了前面所示的应用程序菜单页脚窗格内容。The following example shows the footer pane content of the Application Menu shown previously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当应用程序代码或内部进程（如重新生成布局处理过程）调用 方法时，均会调用此方法。This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the method.
